nodes.text: Bofar was a BFF-1 bulk freighter used by the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

The Bofar was at a makeshift base where prototypes of various TIE Series were being tested. However a single Y-wing from the Alliance was sent to destroy the TIE prototypes and managed to do so since none of the pilots were trained in proper combat. The freighter was a possible casualty of the skirmish as the Y-wing had enough time to destroy it.
